Class AIHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ai.AIHandler

extends java.lang.Object

      • GetAI

        public int GetAI(AIType type,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> inGame)
        Gets a random AI associated with the desired type.
        Parameters:
        type - The AI.
        Returns:
        An AI associated with the type. If the type is random, then it returns an AI with a random type.

        Parameters:

        notAvailable - The colors already selected.
        Returns:
